flashcards_keyboard.title: Did you know?
flashcards_keyboard.body: Use keyboard shortcuts while studying: Space to flip, 1-4 for ratings!

flashcards_spaced_repetition.title: Pro Tip: Spaced Repetition
flashcards_spaced_repetition.body: Our SuperMemo 2 algorithm schedules reviews at optimal intervals. Cards you find 'Easy' appear less often, while 'Again' cards come back sooner.

quiz_adaptive.title: Try Adaptive Quizzes
quiz_adaptive.body: Enable adaptive mode to use the Leitner system—questions you miss will appear more frequently until mastered.

illustrations_pdf.title: Generate Book Illustrations
illustrations_pdf.body: For PDFs and EPUBs, you can generate cohesive illustrations for every page! Preview 1-5 pages first to lock in the art style.

pomodoro_productivity.title: Track Your Productivity
pomodoro_productivity.body: Use the Pomodoro timer (Clock icon in header) to track study sessions. We'll show you daily streaks and analytics!

gallery_discover.title: Discover Community Content
gallery_discover.body: The Gallery shows the best public flashcards and quizzes—upvote your favorites to help others learn!

generation_cost.title: Cost Transparency
generation_cost.body: All AI generation shows estimated costs upfront. Use BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) to control spending and pick your provider.

latex_support.title: Math & LaTeX Support
latex_support.body: Flashcards and quizzes fully support LaTeX! Use $inline$ or $$display$$ notation for beautiful equations.

bulk_editing.title: Bulk Operations
bulk_editing.body: Select multiple cards to tag, suspend, or delete them all at once. Drag to reorder decks instantly!

difficulty_heatmap.title: Difficulty Heat Map
difficulty_heatmap.body: Green cards are mastered, red ones need work. Filter your deck by difficulty to focus on problem areas.
